mapper.insert:
select SEQ_TRANXLOGID.nextval from dual
insert into EZLINK.ETRANXLOG (TRANXLOGID, DATETIME, MERCHANT_TRANX_DATE, VERSION, TRANXCODE, MERCHANT_NO, MERCHANT_REFNO, ORDER_NO, ORDER_INFO, AMOUNT, CURRENCY, SECUREHASH_TYPE, RESPONSE_CODE, APPROVAL_CODE, RRN, CHANNEL, MCC, TRANX_STATUS ) values (#{tranxlogid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{merchantTranxDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranxcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantRefno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{currency,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{securehashType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{responseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rrn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranxStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

TRANXLOGID,

mapper.select: SELECT * from ETRANXLOG where MERCHANT_NO= #{merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and MERCHANT_REFNO= #{merchantTranxRefNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ORDER_NO= #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and AMOUNT= #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and TRANX_STATUS IN('D','Q') and RESPONSE_CODE IN ('00','zz')

SELECT * from ETRANXLOG where MERCHANT_NO= #{merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and MERCHANT_REFNO= #{merchantTranxRefNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ORDER_NO= #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and AMOUNT= #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
SELECT TRANXLOGID FROM ETRANXLOG WHERE TRANX_STATUS IN ('R','S')
